entry.title: Extras
entry.content:
More dicitonaries were added to extras:

  • [Latin, Romanian] Dicționar latin român
  • [Latin, Czech] slovnik.cz
  • [Ancient Greek, German] Handwörterbuch der griechischen Sprache
  • [Ancient Greek] Suda (Σοῦδα)
  • [Latin] Full transcript of Latin abbreviations by Cappelli
  • [Latin] Latin epigraphic abbreviations by Trismegistos
  • [Latin, Russian] Реальный словарь классических древностей

We contacted Dr. Walter Redmond and got his consent on distribution of Glossarium Anglico-Latinum. Read his “Casu an Consulto?” if you are interested in Christian philosophy, or “The Legacy of a Teacher: Interview with Walter Redmond” (in Spanish) about his way in philosophy (muy inspiradora!).
entry.summary: More dicitonaries were added to extras:

entry.title: Extras
entry.content:
One dictionary was added to extras—Dicionário de Expressões e Frases Latinas (Latin-Portuguese). Version in ABBYY Lingvo format (DSL) is available in the Dadako’ Knigohran (download).

The same author, Henerik Kocher, has made public several other Latin texts:

  • Provérbios Latinos with translations to Portuguese, English, French, Spanish, Italian and Esperanto.
  • Provérbios Espanhóis and Ingleses contain translations of Spanish and English proverbs to Latin language.
  • Sentenças de Publílio Siro (English, French, Portuguese).
entry.summary: One dictionary was added to extras—Dicionário de Expressões e Frases Latinas (Latin-Portuguese). Version in ABBYY Lingvo format (DSL) is available in the Dadako’ Knigohran (download).

entry.title: A Copious and Critical English-Latin Lexicon

link.title: A Copious and Critical English-Latin Lexicon

entry.title: Lexidion Syriacum
entry.content:
Hahn1825 v1.0:

Sergey Kim has generously donated his transcript of Classic Syriac — Latin lexicon.

Download from GitHub.

entry.title: Extras from FreeDict
entry.content:
FreeDict project provides seven Latin dictionaries, such as Finnish-Latin or Ducth-Latin, which were added to the Extras list in General section.

Some of these wordbooks are sufficiently big and contain 10,000 words or more. Pick Latin language from the drop-down list on the project’s official website to find information about every dictionary.
entry.summary: FreeDict project provides seven Latin dictionaries, such as Finnish-Latin or Ducth-Latin, which were added to the Extras list in General section.

entry.title: Differentias
entry.content:
Richter1750 v1.0:

First release of a companion to Popma’s dictionary.

Download from GitHub.

entry.title: Vademecum in opus Saxonis
entry.content:
Blatt1997 v1.0:

First release of Latin-Latin dictionary based on medieval texts from Denmark. Articles were formatted and emendated (mostly in numbering of subdefinitions).

Download from GitHub.

entry.title: Schrevel1831 and Hederich1825
entry.content:
Two Latin-Greek dictionaries, Schrevel and Hederich, were optimized to reduce consumed memory (about 1 Gb less).

Download: Schrevel1831 v1.8, Hederich1825 v1.3.
entry.summary: Two Latin-Greek dictionaries, Schrevel and Hederich, were optimized to reduce consumed memory (about 1 Gb less).

entry.title: Forcellinus Electronicus Novus
entry.content:
Forcellini v1.3:

  • change: style of sub-parts labels
  • fix: reduce size of the dictionary frame

Download from GitHub.

entry.title: Latinitatis medii aevi lexicon Bohemorum
entry.content:
Bohemia v1.0:

First release of Latin-Czech dictionary.
